text: Hi! Does anyone know how I can owerwite a HubSpot default styling for a CTA module? I have tried to add styling of my own for the classes, but it is place underneath the ID's styling :disappointed:
You can mark the CTA as “Link (no style)” and then add CSS directly

Hi all, is it possible to override the default search module? i want the results to be listed on the same page where you search, not to redirect  to a separate search result page. is this possible??? and also, is it possible to make filters in the search result? for and example i have a search field and also i have a dropdown with categories. so i want to search only for the products with the category selected from the checkbox. is this possible???
